channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Algenist Biotechnological Skincare
channel.desc: Founded by a team of biotechnology scientists in San Francisco, Algenist focuses on the ability of effective, bioactive ingredients, including Alguronic Acid, to deliver visible anti-ageing results.

channel.title: Moda In Pelle
channel.desc: Discover fashionable footwear from Moda In Pelle which combines affordable luxury and complete comfort for you.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Beauty Tools & Accessories Gifts
channel.desc: This new show will focus on reinforcing the three golden rules - cleanse, tone and moisturise. Caroline will also explain how to choose the right moisturiser for the season and your skin type.
